cmp: 几 (small table, almost, a few/how many, how much/how many/several/a few)
mng: flower, earlobe, fig. item on both sides, classifier for flowers, clouds etc

exm.mng: to gorge oneself, to eat heartily (idiom)
to prick up one's ears, to strain to hear sth
to move the jaw, to munch, to masticate
to chew on a large slab (idiom); a large mouthful is hard to chew, to tuck into a great meal
